PRODUCT FEATURES

SCLA - the experiential learning community leading development of tomorrow's leaders

CHECK OUT HIGHLIGHTS OF THE SCLA PLATFORM:

Connect with the SCLA online development platform, our community of mentors - Game Changers, and your chapter peers to develop the hands-on experience and academic and leadership skills that you need to succeed. We provide the tools and you design the customized experience.

SELF-ASSESSMENT ENGINE

  • Complete a few short quizzes to identify strengths and weaknesses in four key areas: Academic & Career, Life Skills, Health & Wellness, and Financial Literacy.

  • Based on your quiz results, our algorithms drive the development of your customized learning path.

  • As your skills advance, your customized plan is updated every 3 to 6 months.

INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPMENT PLAN (IDP)

  • Unique pathway for experiential learning to advance your leadership skills.

  • Based on your self-assessment and actionable - includes recommended content, experiential learning exercises, mentor connections, and local chapter opportunities.

  • Track your progress and refine your IDP as your skills advance.

  • Highlight your new skills on your resume and in interviews.

EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING

  • Platform integrates self-assessment and generation of an IDP for skills development with specific recommendations for mentors, practical exercises, and local chapter activities.

  • Experiential learning driven by the 70-20-10 leadership model help you put new skills into practice, to ensure mastery.

POWERFUL ANALYTICS

  • Analytics dashboard identifies strengths and weaknesses in your skills profile which drives your IDP.

  • Track your progress with real-time data:

  • Up-to-Date Skills Comparison
  • Month-by-Month Progress Tracker
  • Detailed Completion Summaries
  • Points toward SCLA Certification
Once the required metrics have been reached, our members are issued a certificate which verifies completion of certain SCLA Skill Set Learning Modules.
